content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

Fuji Silvertech Private Limited (hereafter referred to as ‘Fuji Silvertech’) and its affiliates recognise and respect the privacy of its website users. Neither Fuji Silvertech nor its affiliates collect personal information, such as the names and mailing addresses of visitors to this website, unless it is voluntarily provided to us. If such information is provided, it may be stored with us and used for Fuji Silvertech’s marketing purposes.

Fuji Silvertech will never share any user information with any external party. We may, without your permission, electronically collect information regarding your use of our website, including, without limitation, your location, e-mail address, and “cookies.” Such information may be used to collect and analyze demographic and other information about Fuji Silvertech website users and will only be used by Fuji Silvertech.

This site may contains links to other external websites (if any) that do not fall under Fuji Silvertech’s domain. Fuji Silvertech is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of any such external websites or websites that don’t belong to Fuji Silvertech. If you choose to follow such links to external websites, you expressly agree to do so at your own risk.

By entering, using, or reviewing any page or piece of content on our website, the user agrees to this policy with full and free consent. The place of jurisdiction will be Ahmedabad City.
